title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 109 - Holiday And Religious Observance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 109 - Holiday And Religious Observance

State Regulations
§ 109.1 - Observance of special holidays
§ 109.2 - Absence from school for religious observance and education

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 109

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 802, 1950; General Construction Law, §24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
